rukus.text: Abraham je indeed exemplary vanguard jeho submission do GOD monotheist kto never kult idols
he bol appreciative z Jeho Lord's blessings He zvolit si him guided him straight chodnicek
My granted him happiness v this zivot do Hereafter he bol s the righteous
Potom my inspirovat ona (Muhammad) nasledovat nabozenstvo Abraham monotheist; he never bol idol worshiper
Sabbath decreed len those zakoncenie disputing it (Zid Christians)! Tvoj Lord bol Jeden judge them Dni Vzkriesenie ich disputes
Ona invite chodnicek tvoj Lord s wisdom laskavy enlightenment a debate them dobry possible chovanie! Tvoj Lord zauzlit lepsie kto has strayed Jeho chodnicek He zauzlit lepsie kto guided jeden
A if ona punish ona inflict equivalent punishment. Ona vyletne miesto do patience radsej z revenge it je lepsie chory jeden
Ona vyletne miesto patience -Tvoj patience bol attainable len GOD's pomoc. Nie rmutit sa them nie annoyed ich kut plany
GOD bol those lead righteous ZIVOT those bol charitable
